content:
OBJECTS = lineb.o m2html.o

.c.o:
	g++ -c -O -finline-functions $*.c

m2html: $(OBJECTS)
	g++ $(OBJECTS)
	cp a.out m2html
	rm a.out
make:
	makemake +g++ -O -finline-functions m2html

clean:
	rm *.o

shar:
	shar -om2html.shar *.[ch] makefile

lineb.o: lineb.c lineb.h
m2html.o: lineb.h m2html.c
